Input area altitude distribution in 100 meter elevation bands. As descrided by Elsberg and others(2001), all available DEMs are used to linearly interpolate conventional glacier surfaces.  
Row 1 are bin center elevations(m). Column 1 are years(1-n). Columns 2-n are the glacier area(km^2) within that bin. Final input file must start at the header "Glacier name AAD, km^2,..."
